title: Ride Me Dirty
description: Her life is in New York. The property she's inherited is in Bridgewater, Montana. Going back to the town she visited every summer as a child stirs up long-forgotten memories and a girlhood crush on not one teen-turned-hot-cowboy but two: cousins Jack and Sam Kane. Fortunately for her, in Bridgewater one cowboy's never enough.In this contemporary version of Vanessa Vale's USA Today bestselling, Bridgewater Mï¿½nage series, Catherine is forced to choose the life she really wants: the big-city lawyer or the small-town cowgirl with two men who want to take her for a very dirty ride.
author: Vanessa Vale
